subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Martin Brodeur said he was screened on both of the Kings’ goals in the final 1 minute 46 seconds as the Devils stumbled and lost to Los Angeles before a capacity crowd at home.
snippet: Martin Brodeur said he was screened on both of the Kings’ goals in the final 1 minute 46 seconds as the Devils stumbled and lost to Los Angeles before a capacity crowd at home.
